pr_title: Add emr and dataproc bootstrap scripts

timeline.message: Add emr and dataproc bootstrap scripts

timeline.author: ZacBlanco
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +33,20 @@ Usage: update-version.sh [-s] <old version> <new version>
 EOF
 )
 
+# Arguments:
+#  $1: old version
+#  $2: new version
+function update_dataproc() {
+    perl -pi -e "s/${1}/${2}/g" integration/dataproc/alluxio.sh
+}
+
+# Arguments:
+#  $1: old version
+#  $2: new version
+function update_emr() {
+    perl -pi -e "s/${1}/${2}/g" integration/emr/alluxio-emr.sh
+}
+
